My mom is gluten-intolerant and though she is not celiac (THAT'S NOT THE ONLY "REAL" FORM OF GLUTEN-INTOLERANCE BTW) it causes her extreme Abdominal pain and difficulty breathing. She also can't stand most of the manufactured gluten-free stuff out there and bakes her own delicious bread and goodies.Â
People need to realize that instead of working really hard to MAKE things gluten free, it's almost Always better to serve things that just happen to be gluten-free all along like rice dishes, potatoes, vegetables, and delicious creme brulee for dessert. :)Â
